function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decrease in demand for banking services due to decline in economic activity","Impact":"Exacerbates the slowdown in economic activities","Mitigation":"Invest in digital banking infrastructure to provide remote services","Technologies":"Digital banking platforms, mobile banking apps","People":"Households, small businesses","Owner":"Banking industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Increase in non-performing loans and bankruptcies due to businesses closing and households losing income","Impact":"Decline in active assets and financial instability","Mitigation":"Implementation of flexible loan repayment schemes and financial assistance programs","Technologies":"Loan management software, financial management tools","People":"Businesses, households","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Difficulty in maintaining social distancing and following lockdown rules while conducting banking activities","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Encourage and invest in contactless banking services, and implement strict safety protocols for in-person interactions","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, biometric authentication, online appointment booking systems","People":"Bank staff, customers","Owner":"Banking industry stakeholders"}]}
